myBlog.title: Improving Last Mile connectivity from public transport
myBlog.content: We wish to reduce the cost of GPS module so that it becomes affordable for rickshaws and autos and we can then connect them to online platforms for ease of booking and improved user experience.
myBlog.author: Anurag Sharma
myBlog.metadesc: We wish to reduce the cost of GPS module so that it becomes affordable for rickshaws and autos and we can then connect them to online platforms for ease of booking and improved user experience.
myBlog.slug: Improving Last Mile connectivity from public transport
